org.dotplot.core
Class DotplotContext

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.core.plugins.PluginContext<Plugin>
      org.dotplot.core.DotplotContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPluginContext<Plugin>, IContext, IFrameworkContext
public class DotplotContext
extends PluginContext<Plugin>

Instances of this class serves as frameworkcontext of the dotplot system.

For usage in the dotplot system the DotplotContext is created by the ContextFactory. Use ContextFactory.getContext() insted of creating a DotplotContext directly.

Author:
Christian Gerhardt
See Also:
ContextFactory

createDotplotFile

public DotplotFile createDotplotFile(java.io.File file)
Creates a DotplotFile out of a File.

The DotplotFile is created by using the DotplotContext's TypeRegistry and TypeBindingRegistry. If no appropiate SourceType could be found the BaseType will be assigned.

Parameters:
file - - the base file.
Returns:
The new DotplotFile
See Also:
BaseType
